indicators.questionText: How well do students know the objective/target of the lesson?
How engaged are students in the learning or learning activities?
How well is the lesson designed to foster student engagement?

To what extent are all students are cognitively engaged in the activities and assignments in their exploration of content? Students initiate or adapt activities and projects to enhance their understanding
How much does the lesson provide for critical thinking?
Does the teacher use formative assessment strategies to check for understanding throughout the course of the lesson?
Are students given the opportunity to self-assess?
How effective is teacher feedback regarding student learning?
To what extent is the instruction differentiated?
How effective was a closure activity?
How engaged are students in the learning or learning activities?
To what extent is the instruction differentiated?
How effective was a closure activity?
